name: autoblog-ai-fullstack
description: AI-powered blog generation tool with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.dev:detailed: concurrently "cd autoblog-ai && npm run start:dev" "cd blog-ui && npm start" --names "ğŸš€backend,ğŸŒfrontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.vercel:build: npm run install:all && npm run build
